div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xixo
die aprilis quo Supra

The said day Jonhne andirson' grantit to big his syd' dik and hed
dik betuix him and the lande of Jonhne of Cullan one the southt
part Sufficientlie as efferis In continent but delay

The saide day Jonhne of Kethe oblist him be his hand vphaldin
to pay or' ger' pay to Jonhne moir' sex s' viij d' be lammes
next to cum of the rest of ane tyk of ane fethir' bed'

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis chargit Androw smitht to
mak and big his dikis Sufficientlie as efferis betuix him
and the lande of Thom talyour'

The saide day Jonet Kintor the videw of Jonhne Steuinsone
grantit that scho hede Sett the hous' and lande quhar' peter futhes
duelt to Alexander makbetht for' this yer' to Cum

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that
next cumis to Androw litstar' to ansuer' perempturlie to Alexander
hay Androw litstar Alexander hay and Jonhne lundoris anent thar billis
of waring' and compt rekning of thar merchandis contenit in the
samyn deliuerit to the saide Androw eftir the tenor of the samyn
And' in likuys' thai assignit the saide androw to ansuer' perumpturlie
to James Colisone gif thai aggre nocht or thane Anent
viij barrelis and demi of Salmond' quhilkis he Intromettit with pertening
to the said' James et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxij die aprilis anno quo Supra

The saide day magis still saide scho hed nay thing to say to
Richerd Waus the bailye nay scho was nocht complanteous' on' him

The saide day Dauid Kintor oblist him to pay to Isabel of Cullan
gif it beis preuit that he resavit fra Jonhne Damar' of copin the
gravin or ony vthiris his factouris Siluer to by half ane hude of
quhet to the said Isabell that the said Dauid sal pay to hir' for
ilkan boll of quhet auchtene Schillingis scottis money
alssone as it beis preuyt

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert
blinsele forspekar' that Dauid Kintor' yongar sale pay to William
goldsmith sevin s' and sex g' for demi barrell of Salmond' the
said' William payand fraucht and vncostis for the said' demi barrell
of Salmond'

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Alexander Rede
forspekar that gif euire magis still dois ony strubulance tile ony
persone in tyme to Cum scho salbe secludit fra hir' craft in
tymmis to Cum and' atour scho was conuikit for strubulance of Richerd'
Waus the balye et cetera

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod cristina
oge est legittima et propinquior heres quondam Thome oyg patris
suj Incole de Abirdene et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die mensis aprilis quo Supra

The saide day James of Kennarty yongar grantit that he hed'
borrouit ane rinsche guthtling of gold' fra Jonhne of fullerton'
and tuk to preiwe that Jonhne chamer and ramsay hed pait the said
rynsche guthtlinge Ande gif thai hed' nocht pait he suld' pay
it

The saide day Alexander hay was conuikit be ane Suorne
assis' Williame blinsel forspekar for strubulance of Androw
litstar' ffor the quhilkis bath the partiis was oblist be the fathtis
of thar bodiis to stand at the ordinance of the said assis'
quhilkis riplie auisit deliuerit and ordanit the said Alexander hay sal pay
j li' of wax to the haly blud' licht And to pay fiwe li'
to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin gif euir he dois ony
fre strubulance to the said Androw or ony vthir nichbour in tym to cum
and he be conuikit tharintill

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die mensis aprilis anno quo Supra

Eodem die Thomas ridale fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Andream elphinstone de Selmys et Johannem Colysone coniunctim et divisim
suos legitimos procuratores actores et factores ad prosequendum suam assedacionem penes
terram quam Inhabitat alias captam ab ellena Colly Jacentem infra dictum
burgum in vico castrj clamat' per Willelmum buchane hereditarie sibi attingere
Agend' defendend' prosequend' calumpniand' ceteram faciend' et cetera promitten'
de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et
oportunis

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the consall for
the commone profit of the towne In presence of the baxtaris that ale
baxtaris of this tone sal bak brede of quhet clene fresche
and gude Stuf wele bakin to furnys' the tone the tua penny brede
weyand' xxv vncez and the penny brede xij vnce and demi / Ande
gude Ry brede clene boutyt lavynnit and wele bakin the tua
penny brede off xxxiiij vnce the penny brede weying xvij
vnce Ande vnboutit the tua penny brede weyand' xxviij
vnce and the penny brede xix vnce And that nayne baxtar sal
Sele nay brede in tymes to Cum quhil ane balye or' ane sergeand'
cum with wechtis and wey thar' brede and consider and vndirstand that thai
halde the saide wecht Ande quhat baxtar that falyes hertintill
and beis conuikit tharof sale be expellit the Craft for ane yer and his
brede to be eschetis And that nane sel bred to ald' Abirdene nor
to outduellaris of les' wecht and gif ony dois and beis conuikit tharof
sal pay x s' to Saint nicholes werk and salbe expellit
fra the craft for' ane yer'

The saide day Jonhne Scrogy was conuikit be ane Suorne assis' patrik
leslie forspekar' for the wranguys' avay takin of brok of corne
out of Alexander chameris yarde quhilkis his avne Catall drew herfor
the saide Jonhne was in ane Amerciament of the court' et cetera and to Amend' as
law will

The saide day Richard redhed patrik clerk and Donald baxtar ilkan
of tham in ane Amerciament of the court be thar avne gravnt for brekin of the
pace in bakin of bred' et cetera for the quhilkis Ilkan sal pay j li' wax
to the haly blud' licht

The saide day thome Alexandersone was conuikit for strubulance of Jhon'
annand' in word et cetera Ande gif euere he committis ony strubulance to the saide
or the said Jhon' to him and beis conuikit tharof sale pay xx s' to
Sanct nicholes werk and the saide thomas j barrel of wax to the
haly blud' licht

head.add: the abbat and prior of bonacord'

div.head: anno domini et cetera nonagesimo nono
div.p:
One maij day at the woman hill the aldirman balyes and'
Consale grantit and promittit to
abbat and priour of bonacord' tene merkis to thar fe for this yeris seruice

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto die
mensis maij anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo nono

Eodem die Johannes thomsone litstar deuenit plegius legalis quod
Andreas gall erit Indempnis pro Johanne lammyntone aliter quam per
viam iuris Et thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes
erit Indempnis pro dicto andrea aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet
dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione

The samyn day Jonet clat was conuikit be ane suorne assis'
alexander red forspekar for the wranguys' avay takin of certane
scheip out of Androw gallis hous' and for the brekin of his dur'
for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court and to amend'
as law wil and to forber' in tyme to Cum Ande Jok lammyntone
was conuikit be the saide assis' the saide alexander Rede forspekar
for the wranguis' takin of Certan schep out of the saide
hous' and brekin of the said dur' as saide is et cetera

The saide day Jonet clat and Jok lammyntone was conuikit
be the saide assis' Alexander Rede forspekar for the avay takin of
Certan Schep fra Androw gall this day takin in his
Corne for the quhilkis thai war' in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera

The saide day It was fundin be ane suorne assis' alexander
rede forspekar that Jonhne litstar thomsone hed' done nay wrang
in the haldin of Thome litile Johnis Couering quhile he war'
pait of it that was aving to him
The said' day maly rede conuictis for strubulance of gelis allirdes et cetera

The saide Sevint day of maij sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' knicht and
aldirman become Souerte be his hand' to thomas leslie ane
of the balyeis of Abirdene to vphald and Sustene the lande and tenement
of vmquhile henry ruthirfurde liand' within the saide burghe in the
Schipraw als'uele as it is now at his entre tharto eftir the tenor
of our Souerane lordis lettres direkit tharupon' befor' thomas prat
Johne Wormet gilbert menyeis Jonhne of Retre gilbert Riburne
Alexander chamer in the schipraw and Androw nachtj sergeand'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die
mensis maij anno quo Supra

The saide day comperit William futhes befor the aldirman and balyeis
and askit ane twne pip of wad' at Cornelys boll skippar of the
pillekane and mastir vndir gode of the said' schip of the Campveris
eftir the tenor' of Johne Wastallis writ directit to hym tharupon'
Ande the said' Cornelis and Dauid Kintor his clerk maid' fatht
that thai saw nor' Resavit nor' gat ane pip of wad' fra the saide Jhon'
merkit with hthe merk of the said' William nor' vthir wais nor nay pip
of the behalff of the said' Williamis herfor the said' William allegit
his aventour passit of the sey and protestit for Remed' of law and askit
Instrument at me sere Johne Stirueling notar and Certificacion vndir
the Secret sele witnes thomas prat Johne Retre mastir
Androw Crawfurd' Johne andirsone William goldsmyth Johne fullerton'
philp Dunbrek Androw nachtj sergeandis Dauid liell and Jhon' Williamsone
dempstar

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die
maij anno quo Supra

The saide day comperit mavnys nolsone schipman of the Were
as day assignit to him deponit the gret aithe that he promittit nocht to
pay the fracht clamit be patrik chernsid' of Certane gudis and the
said' mavnis quyt of the pament of the said' fraucht

The saide day It was fundin that Johne low sal pay xviij s' to patrik andirsone
for the maile of ane loft

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be the Consal In presence
of the aldirman that Jonhne of glenmaluyn sal haue xij d' ilkane
day to his sustentacion and ane seruand' with him quhilkis salbe recom
pensit and pait to Jonhne of tulibow sene his entre with the saide
Johne of glenmaluyn quhilk was the xxtj day of aprile last bigan

The saide Thome philp grantit him avand to Thomas prat
tua prevys' stane of lynt and demi to be pait within terme of law

The saide day It was deliueryt that Walter blaklok sal pay to Willekin the
haill fraucht of be ane Suorne
assis' Alexander rede forspekar' of the saide assis'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Alexander rede forspekar that Walter blaklok sale pay to Willekin
skippar the fraucht for' sex hudis of quhet v les' Ande the
saide Willekin and his marinaris sal acquyt thame that thai
did' nay skathis nor wyst nay skath done to the saide quhet

The saide day It was deliuerit fundin and ordanit that the
baxtaris of this burghe sal bak breid' to the sustening of
the tone eftir the tenor' of the last Statut' be ane suorne
assis' Alexander rede forspekar Ande gif thai all want brede
atanys ony tymes to Cum thai sal pay xx s' to Sanct
nicholes werk vnforgevin the baxtaris beand' oblist
to stand' to the said' deliuerance

The saide day Willekin and his marinaris deponit the gret
aith' that thai did' nay skath' to the quhet Input in his schip
pertening to Willekin Walter blaklok eftir the tenor' of the ak
maid' tharupon Obefor'

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' gilbert menyes
forspekar that gif gilbert of gareauche hed' pait to thom ridal his hale hir'
out of birron' he suld pay the demi agan to William of gareauche and thom Ridal
grantit him pait of the hal hir'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
maij quo Supra

the saide day It was fundin be the Inquest of the Court that the
pip of wad beand' arrestit at the Instance and clame of Androw
litstar be lousit and lattyne to borghe' to Johne grig becaus'
the saide pip was merkit with the said' Jonhne grigis merk as in the emissarie lettre drectit fra the said Jhon' vastal to the said' Jhon grig mair' fullie is contenit
the said' Jonhne findand' sufficient Souerte and caucion
to do to the said' Androw it that accordis of law and resone
for the said' pip And In continent the said Jonhne fande
Jonhne Wormet souerte to the balyeis to do to the said' Androw
it that accordis to be done for the said' pip of wad' of law
and resone And the said' Johne grig oblist him' be his
hande landis and gudis to freithe and keip the said' Johne Wormet
Skathles of the said' Caucion and Souerte

Eodem die patricius chernsid' amerciatur per assisam pro perturbio magnj
olson' et Idem magnus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti patricij et quilibet alteri emendabit

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid
menyeis forspekar that patrik chernsid' sal pay ij li' wax to the
haly blud' licht for the offence done to mavnys olsone

the xvij day of maij Dauid Kintor yongar grantit him to pay
to Thome narne j barrel of quhet at the cumyn of the next
schippis cumand' out of flandris eftir the passage of
Willekin now beand' within the havin of Abirdene and falyeing
tharof to pay the said thomas ane franche crovne
and the said' barrell to be fresche and sufficient gude

The saide day the haile tone warnit be the premunicion of the
bell and the officiaris throw the haile tone and Circualy Inquerit
be the officiar' affermit and ratifeit the statutis and akis maid'
anent the kepin of the tone fra the pestilence and strange seknes
obefor And' has ordanit that theai be porte of the Castal gate
passand' to futy be closit and the port of to the Est extendand'
one the northt part of the samyn gat bevne Robert blinsellis yet
be oppin in the day and lokit with lokis and keis And in likuys' the
port of the gallougat be vpmad' and closit with lokis and keis
Ande the aldirman in our Soueran lordis name and be virteu of his
office chargit and commandit the haile tone to se avys' ande
provide for the kepin of the tone as thai walde ansuer' to
the kingis hienes and offerit him redy to do al that thai
wald' charge him to do tharanent Ande the haile tone tuk
one thame to keip the said' four portis Ilkane quartar
thar avne port Sufficientlie as efferis as thai walde
ansuer' tharupone of the quhilkis the aldirman askit at me
sere Jonhne stirueling notar public' befor witnes Robert blinsell Alexander menyes
Thomas prat Duncan Colisone William futhes Robert Crag

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij
die maij anno quo Supra

Eodem die Dauid cay amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Roberti blinsel
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Dauid' Cornuel Et Idem Dauid cornuell
amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Dauid cay et quilibet alteri emendabit ut
Jura volunt

head.add: levinston' de schetland' suthirburghe militis ac lefond de schetland' et cetera

div.p:
Eodem die Walterus leuinstone Capitaneus cuiusdam nauis
maria ros' vocate David sanclar' Jacobus forsy Robertus forbrand Johannes
glene hugo suanstone Thomas persone Johannes Cuk alias
mccur' Johannes fergussone Willelmus Inglis' laurencius Corntone
Alexander michelsone henricus orknay et Walterus hwme
Accusati pro perturbio Dauid Cornuell et Willof
opidani de reperti quiti de omni perturbio eorundem per Juratam
assisam ex ore Roberti blinsell prelocutoris eiusdem Similiter quibus dictus
Walterus leuinstone peciit Instrumentum et Certificacionem Curie Testibus Alexandro
menyes David menyes Johanne Cullan gilberto menyes Ricardo ruthirfurd' dominis
Roberto Waus Ricardo Andirson' capellanis Duncano Crak Dauid liell philippo
Dunbrek seriando et Johanne Williamsone Judicatore Curie

Eodem die patricius lesie deuenit plegius preposito Ad Intrandum
Dauid cay terram ipso ballivis et consulibus dicti burgi quoniam ad hoc premunitus
fuerit ad subeundum coram eis que de Jure Incumbunt

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis Junij anno predicto

The saide day Williame portar dischargit him
of the contrak and appontment maid' to him and the curat
of abirdene be Jonhne glenny and Anny mathesone his
spous' anent the bying of hir' ayrschip and ourgaf the
Samyn now and foreuire for the quhilkis the saide Anny
with consent of hir' saide Spous' gaf to the saide
William portar the best siluer pece that pertenis to hir'
of ayrschipe

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem
Curia quod Agnes mathosone filia quondam Dauid ma
thesone est legittima et propinquior heres quondam dicti
Dauid patris suj et cetera

The saide day thar' was sex scoir' and x treis deliuerit
be Thomas leslie balye with ane mast and j ray inkepin'
quhil this day xv dais and gif Jonhne fechat pais
to gilbert litstar xix scottis cronis be the saide day the
balye sal deliuer him the said treis mast and ray the
said' xix crovnis being' pait And gif the saide Jhon'
fechat falyeis in pament of the said xix crovnis at
the said day / thane the saide treis mast and ray salbe
deliuerit to the said' gilbert

Septimo die mensis Junij anno quo Supra patricius Rede
deuenit plegius legalis quod Willelmus goldsmith erit Indempnis
pro Johanne sanclar' aliter quam per viam iuris Et Robertus Kintor
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro prefato
Willelmo aliter quam per viam iuris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur
ad conseruandum suis plegiis Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio septimo

Eodem die cristina oge fecit constituit creauit et nominavit magistrum
Walterum lang suum legittimum procuratorem cum potestate substituendum vnum et plures
ad prosequendum terram sibi iure hereditario contingen' Jacentem infra vic dictum
burgum Agend' defendend' et cetera promitten' de Rato et grato Judicio
sisti et cetera Cum Ceteris clausulis mecessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo die
Junij quo Supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Dauid menyes forspekar that Dauid blinsele sal deliuer j pip
of wyne to Johne sanclar' and he sal gif to the said David j frank
